problem_text:
What are the composition factors of non-soluble finite groups all of whose normalizers of Sylow subgroups are 2-nilpotent, in particular, supersoluble?
V. S. Monakhov
answer: Described (L. S. Kazarin, A. A. Volochkov, Mathematics in Yaroslavl’ Univ.: Coll. of Surveys to 30-th Anniv. of Math. Fac., Yaroslavl’, 2006, 243–255 (Russian)).
